threadsafe.span: 除外 ，所有的公共和受保护的成员 都是线程安全的，可从多个线程并发使用。

span.span: With the exception of , all public and protected members of are thread-safe and may be used concurrently from multiple threads.

threadsafe.span: 为和属性返回的 值 特定于在其上访问该属性的线程。

span.span: The value returned for the and properties is specific for the thread on which the property is accessed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `T`当首次访问时，将使用的默认值来初始化实例 。The default value of `T` is used to initialize the instance when is accessed for the first time. 此构造函数等效于 使用参数的值调用构造函数 `false` `trackAllValues` 。This constructor is equivalent to calling the constructor with a value of `false` for the `trackAllValues` argument.

summary.span: 初始化 实例并指定是否可从任意线程访问所有值。

span.span: Initializes the instance and specifies whether all values are accessible from any thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `trackAllValues` 为 `false` ，则仅可访问当前线程的此实例的值。If `trackAllValues` is `false`, only the value of this instance for the current thread is accessible. 尝试使用 属性检索所有值会引发 异常。Attempting to use the property to retrieve all values throws an exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `trackAllValues` 为 `false` ，则仅可访问当前线程的此实例的值。If `trackAllValues` is `false`, only the value of this instance for the current thread is accessible. 尝试使用 属性检索所有值会引发 异常。Attempting to use the property to retrieve all values throws an exception.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 释放 类的当前实例所使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 `Dispose` 后，应调用 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法使 处于不可用状态。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 调用后 `Dispose` ，必须释放对的所有引用， 以便垃圾回收器能够回收占用的内存 。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) 和 [实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 `Dispose` 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

Public Overrides Function ToString () As String

summary.span: 创建并返回当前线程的此实例的字符串表示形式。

span.span: Creates and returns a string representation of this instance for the current thread.

returns.span: 对 调用 的结果。

span.span: The result of calling on the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法会强制初始化当前线程，就像直接访问一样 。Calling this method forces initialization for the current thread, as is the case with accessing directly.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property T Value { T get(); void set(T value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置当前线程的此实例的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of this instance for the current thread.

value.span: 返回此 ThreadLocal 负责初始化的对象的实例。

span.span: Returns an instance of the object that this ThreadLocal is responsible for initializing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果之前未为当前线程初始化此实例，则访问 将尝试对其进行初始化。If this instance was not previously initialized for the current thread, accessing will attempt to initialize it. 如果初始化函数是在构造过程中提供的，则通过调用函数来检索的初始值来执行初始化 。If an initialization function was supplied during the construction, that initialization will happen by invoking the function to retrieve the initial value for . 否则，将使用的默认值 `T` 。Otherwise, the default value of `T` will be used.

span.span: The instance has been disposed.

exception.span: 初始化函数尝试以递归方式引用 。

span.span: The initialization function attempted to reference recursively.

exception.span: 没有提供无参数构造函数，且没有提供值工厂。

span.span: No parameterless constructor is provided and no value factory is supplied.
Lazy Initialization

summary.span: 获取当前由已经访问此实例的所有线程存储的所有值的列表。

span.span: Gets a list for all of the values currently stored by all of the threads that have accessed this instance.

value.span: 访问此实例由所有线程存储的当前的所有值的列表。

span.span: A list for all of the values currently stored by all of the threads that have accessed this instance.

exception.span: 所有线程存储的值均不可用，因为此实例通过将 参数在对类构造函数的调用中设为 进行初始化。

span.span: Values stored by all threads are not available because this instance was initialized with the argument set to in the call to a class constructor.
The instance has been disposed.
